idea:
The company 's vision is to become a trustworthy leader in providing diversified platforms to entrepreneurs & aspirants to enable their business objectives with growth, empowerment & right ecosystem. TBNF was founded with talented members of the diversed profession in order to ensure very cooperative, friendly & yet professional environment to its members to nurture their growth.


This business networking platform helps connect startups, MSMEs & Entrepreneurs to exchange business leads & requirements to grow with each other in healthy & prosperous environment.
name: TBNF BUSINESS NETWORKING PVT. LTD.

idea:
We started Bridging Gap( B gap private limited) with an aim to help small and medium  companies experience premium advertising and marketing services under one roof in economical manner.  We incorporated B Gap Private Limited in Bandra, Mumbai. As we started exploring and found out that today companies are investing their lots of time on marketing activities and all from different sources which is a very painful and time consuming process. There was a need for a solution which can take care of all their marketing activities under one roof. 


Bridging Gap will help small and medium companies specially unorganised sector to improve their marketing efforts, be it a Brand Identity, Web Portals, Application development, e-commerce portals, Social Media Marketing, Business plans. Marketing Strategies, Research, Corporate films, Explainer videos, Exhibitions, Product launch, lead generation, Corporate presentations all under one roof.


The Vision is to bring unorganised sector into organised category and bring bespoke marketing solutions.
name: B.GAP PRIVATE LIMITED
